title: The Book Mobile (wakeboarding) Volumes 1-5
description:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œThe BookÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ contains more content then every other wakeboarding instructional combined. The series covers everything you could ever want to know about the sport of wakeboarding from how to set up your board to the most advanced tricks being done today. It is presented in an organized format that makes even the hardest tricks easy to break down into their simplest parts. This approach lets you work on skills individually in order to build a solid wakeboarding foundation, and has never been used in any other instructional.

Getting Started 
Getting Started contains tips for all levels of riding. This DVD starts you at ground zero, and takes you through equipment, boating, getting up, and edging techniques. 

Building a Foundation 
Building a Foundation is essential for all levels of riding. Whether you are an advanced rider looking to land a 720, or a beginner learning to land blind, it all starts here with solid fundamentals. 

Base Inverts 
Base Inverts focuses in on the eight base inverts. We will show you how to do everything from on-land training with the trampoline, to various grabs and variations of the inverts. 

Spinning 
Spinning is a broad DVD that takes you from 180ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s to 900ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s. Learn to spin heelside, toeside, frontside, backside, on axis, and even off axis. 

Intermediate and Advanced Inverts 
Intermediate and advanced inverts is for the wakeboarder that is ready to take their riding to the next level. Watch as The Book takes even the most complex inverts and breaks them down into simpler steps.
